mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_name, category_id, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_saleBegin, goods_saleEnd, goods_delivery, goods_img, goods_reg, goods_regDate, goods_state from goods

select goods_id, goods_name, category_id, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_saleBegin, goods_saleEnd, goods_delivery, goods_img, goods_reg, goods_regDate, goods_state from goods where goods_id=#{goods_id}

select goods_id, goods_name, category_id, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_saleBegin, goods_saleEnd, goods_delivery, goods_img, goods_reg, goods_regDate, goods_state from goods order by rand() limit #{num}

select c.goods_id, goods_name, category_id, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_saleBegin, goods_saleEnd, goods_delivery, goods_img, goods_reg, goods_regDate, goods_state from cart inner join goods on cart.goods_id = goods.goods_id where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_id, user_id, goods_id, cart_goods_cont) value(#{cart_id}, #{user_id}, #{goods_id}, #{cart_goods_cont})
